TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ActivityTrackingLocation extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 定義對應根工作流程執行個體潛在執行路徑中活動狀態事件的活動限定位置。

span.span: Defines an activity-qualified location that corresponds to an activity status event in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 每當活動的執行狀態變更時，工作流程執行個體都會發出活動狀態事件到執行階段追蹤基礎結構。Whenever the execution status of an activity changes, the workflow instance emits an activity status event to the runtime tracking infrastructure. 每當發生活動狀態事件時，執行階段追蹤基礎結構可以傳送 至追蹤服務。The runtime tracking infrastructure can send the tracking service an whenever an activity status event occurs. 追蹤服務通常不需要用到發生在工作流程執行個體中的每個活動狀態事件，而是只會需要用到與位於工作流程執行個體中指定位置的特定種類活動關聯的活動狀態事件。Usually, a tracking service is not interested in every activity status event that occurs in the workflow instance, but only in activity status events associated with certain kinds of activities at specified locations in the workflow instance. 會指定參考活動類型、一組活動狀態變更事件，以及可更精確地限定參考活動類型之執行個體的一組條件，藉此定義比對參數。An defines the matching parameters for such a location by specifying a reference activity type, a set of activity status change events, and a set of conditions that can more precisely qualify an instance or instances of the reference activity type. > [!NOTE] > 單一 可能會參考工作流程執行個體潛在執行路徑中的多個實際位置。A single may refer to more than one actual location in the potential execution path of a workflow instance. 您可以將 物件加入至 和 ，以定義 中 的比對參數。You add objects to and in order to define the match parameters for an in a . 您必須設定 或 ，以指定要比對的參考活動類型。You must specify the reference activity type to be matched by setting either or . 您可以設定 以指定要使用哪些衍生自參考活動類型的活動。You may set to specify interest in activities derived from the reference activity type. 您可以將 值加入至 中，以指定要比對的活動狀態事件。You may add values to to specify the activity status events to be matched. 您可以將 物件加入至 中，以指定要使用哪些僅適用於特定條件的參考活動類型。You may add objects to to specify interest in the reference activity type only for specific conditions. 例如，您可以指定只要使用哪些參考活動類型的特定具名執行個體。For example, you can specify interest in only a particular named instance of the reference activity type.

summary.span: 取得或設定位置的參考活動類型非限定名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the reference activity type for the location.

value.span: 參考活動類型的非限定名稱。

span.span: The unqualified name of the reference activity type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須指定參考活動類型的非限定名稱。You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type. 例如，若要指定 活動的非限定名稱，請將 設定為 "CodeActivity"。For example, to specify the unqualified name of a activity set to "CodeActivity". 提供了一種方式，可讓您在直接以 XML 撰寫設定檔時更輕鬆地指定參考活動類型。 provides a much easier way to specify a reference activity type when you author a profile directly in XML. 也提供一種與版本無關的方式，讓您針對參考活動類型進行參考。 also provides a version-independent way of referring to a reference activity type. 您必須指定 的 或 。You must specify either the or for the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Conditions As TrackingConditionCollection

summary.span: 取得條件集合，這些條件是用來限定要使用哪些活動。

span.span: Gets a collection of conditions that are used to qualify interest in the activity.

value.span: ，其中包含用來限定要使用哪些活動的條件。

span.span: A that contains conditions that are used to qualify interest in the activity.
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 更精確地定義要比對之參考活動類型的執行個體。You can use to more precisely define the instance of the reference activity type to be matched. 例如，如果您只想要比對 等於 "MyCode" 的 活動，則可以將 設定為 "CodeActivity"，並且將 加入至 ，後者會指定活動執行個體的 屬性必須等於 "MyCode"。For example, if you want to match only activities with an equal to "MyCode", you can set to"CodeActivity" and add an to that specifies that the property of the activity instance must be equal to "MyCode". 中的每個 必須是 `true`，而且 中的其中一個 值必須符合， 才能比對。Every in must be `true` and one of the values in must be matched for the to be matched.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ExecutionStatusEvents As IList(Of ActivityExecutionStatus)

summary.span: 取得可針對此位置比對之活動狀態事件的清單。

span.span: Gets the list of activity status events that can be matched for this location.

value.span: 包含一個或多個 值的 。

span.span: A that contains one or more of the values.
The default is an empty list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會指定可比對其 的活動狀態事件。 specifies the activity status events for which the can be matched. 中的其中一個 值必須符合，而且 中的每個 必須是 `true`， 才能比對。One of the values in must be matched and every in must be `true` for the to be matched. 空的清單表示不比對任何事件。An empty list specifies that no events are to be matched.
